III-R.BK.long_name: Triple i Logistics Public Company Limited
III-R.BK.summary: Triple i Logistics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides domestic and international freight forwarding and integrated logistics services. It operates through Air freight; Sea and In-Land Freight Logistics Management; Chemical and Hazardous Goods Logistics; and Other Management Services segments. The company offers air freight services, such as wholesale air freight, forwarding, general sales agency for airlines, and airport cargo terminal services; sea freight and inland transportation services, including shipping line agency, less than container load, and inland container transport services; logistic management, and warehouse and distribution services; and chemical and specialty logistics services, such as hazardous and dangerous goods logistics integrating, and dangerous goods packaging solutions. It also provides packaging services. In addition, the company offers office rental and other management services. Triple i Logistics Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JWD-R.BK.summary: JWD InfoLogistics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the integrated in-land and oversea logistics business in Thailand, Taiwan, the United States, Myanmar, Laos, Cambodia, and internationally. The company operates through six segments: Integrated Logistics, Supply Chain and Warehouse Management; Transportation Services; Domestic and International Removal; Record and Information Storage; Foods; and Others. It offers warehousing and yard management, customs clearance, and transportation and distribution management consultancy, as well as logistics software development services; and other value added services. The company also develops and manages office and warehouse properties; provides investment consultation, and warehouse management services; and offers property management services, including facility, financial, environment and power, and safety management, as well as building inspection and fire exercise services. In addition, it offers household, factory, office, and fine arts and exhibition items removal services; self storage services; record and information management services; and IT solutions for supply chain management. Further, the company provides buildings and other construction facilities rental, moving, land rental, port, carriage, goods packing and handling, cargo container, cold storage, and art storage services; sells temperature controlled equipment; and sells and installs electronics devices, software applications, and network services. It primarily serves customers in automotive and parts, chemicals and dangerous goods, and food and cold chain sectors. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KEX-R.BK.summary: Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited offers parcel delivery services in Thailand, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Malaysia. It primarily serves international express firms, e-commerce companies, home shopping channels, banks, technology firms, telecom companies, financial institutes, and schools, as well as local retail chains. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Kerry Logistics Network Limited.

It primarily serves international express firms, e-commerce companies, home shopping channels, banks, technology firms, telecom companies, financial institutes, and schools, as well as local retail chains. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Kerry Logistics Network Limited.

LEO-R.BK.long_name: Leo Global Logistics Public Company Limited
LEO-R.BK.summary: LEO Global Logistics Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides international freight forwarding and integrated logistics services. The company offers sea freight, airfreight, project cargo, truck transportation, multimodal transportation, warehouse, and private storage services; and other services, such as express delivery, insurance, customs clearance, and packing services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NCL-R.BK.long_name: NCL International Logistics Public Company Limited
NCL-R.BK.summary: NCL International Logistics Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides international freight forwarding, customs broker, inland transportation, multimodal transport operation, and other freight related services. It operates through four segments: Land Transportation, Freight Forwarding, Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier, and Producing and Distributing Dialysis. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYT-R.BK.summary: Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited provides port services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Seaport and Related Services; and Warehouse Service. It offers roll-on/roll-off (Ro/Ro) terminal services for liners and automobile manufacturers to transport vehicles and general cargo at A5 Terminal, Laem Chabang Port located in the Chonburi. The company also provides parking space for preparing vehicles prior to export or after import; and office and equipment rental services, as well as vehicle cleaning services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 270,027 square meters of warehousing areas; and 1,000 square meters of warehouse. Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NYT.BK.summary: Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited provides port services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Seaport and Related Services; and Warehouse Service. It offers roll-on/roll-off (Ro/Ro) terminal services for liners and automobile manufacturers to transport vehicles and general cargo at A5 Terminal, Laem Chabang Port located in the Chonburi. The company also provides parking space for preparing vehicles prior to export or after import; and office and equipment rental services, as well as vehicle cleaning services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 270,027 square meters of warehousing areas; and 1,000 square meters of warehouse. Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SONIC-R.BK.summary: Sonic Interfreight Public Company Limited provides freight forwarding, land transportation, and related logistics services in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Freight Forwarder, Land Transportation, and Others. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SONIC.BK.summary: Sonic Interfreight Public Company Limited provides freight forwarding, land transportation, and related logistics services in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Freight Forwarder, Land Transportation, and Others. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WICE-R.BK.summary: Wice Logistics Public Company Limited provides air and sea freight forwarding, customs brokerage, inland transportation, cross-border and multimodal transportation, warehousing, and various freight related services for imports and exports in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Sea Freight, Air Freight, Cross Border Service, and Logistics segments. The company transports sea freight, including full container load and less than container load services for various forwarders and containers; and offers air freight services. It also provides customs clearance services, including duty intensive consultation; internal transportation services using trailer and dump trucks, lorries, or minivans from pick up point to the port; and warehouse storage services, such as multi user and dedicated warehouses, and warehouse management. The company was formerly known as Wice Freight Services (Thailand) Company Limited and changed its name to Wice Logistics Public Company Limited in April 2015. Wice Logistics Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
